sentence.Network_en: She did her best to smarten her husband up.
sentence.Network_cn: 她尽最大努力把丈夫打扮得更英俊.

sentence.Network_en: You need to smarten ( yourself ) up before you go out.
sentence.Network_cn: 你应该打扮一下再出去.

sentence.Network_en: You'll have to smarten up if you want to pass those exams.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是想通过考试,思维就必须更加敏捷.

list.abs: 带up的词组以及例句_百度知道 ... slice up 切片 smarten up 变得漂亮 snatch up 夺取.
... informal (make slower, hinder) 非正式用语使…慢下来，使放慢 vtrsmarten up 打扮起来，装饰整齐dǎ bàn qǐ lái, zhuāng shì zhěng qí
She smartened herself up for the concert., 她打扮停当去听音乐会.
The hotel has been smartened up by the new owners ., 新业主把旅馆修葺一新.
The shop will have to be smartened up ., 这家商店需要装饰一番.
